Question: Advanced Technology Research Institute(ATRI) CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Industrial Technology Research Institute (ITRI)

CES 2024 Showcase

- AR Interactive Vehicle Display for augmented reality content in moving vehicles
- Hyper-Realistic 3D Display with digital avatar interaction
- Detachable Joint Robot System for rapid assembly of robots
- RoboTwin: Metaverse Smart Factory Simulation Platform for realistic manufacturing factory simulation
- iGolfPutter smart golf analysis and training system
